wikipedia_page.main: Richard H. Young was an English footballer who made one appearance as a left half for Southend United in the Football League. He also played for Grays Thurrock.

response: *Richard Young (photographer) (born 1947), English society and celebrity photographer
*Richard Young (actor) (born 1955), American film and television actor
*Richard Young (New York congressman) (1846–1935), House Representative for New York state
*Richard Younge or Young (fl. 1640–1670), Calvinist tract writer
